D. Sanjay Dutt and Chetan Chauhan are involved in a comedic rivalry.
Answer: Sanjay Dutt plays the character of Chetan Chauhan., Chetan Chauhan is a supporting character in the film., Sanjay Dutt and Chetan Chauhan are involved in a comedic rivalry.
